snippet.title: Ninja Scroller by Mars Touch Studio - GOLD 1.47.0 - RELEASE
snippet.description:
Ninja Scroller by Mars Touch Studio
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2150800/Ninja_Scroller/
https://gamejolt.com/games/NinjaScroller/667996
https://mars-touch-studio.itch.io/ninja-scroller

==============================

Ninja Scroller GOLD 1.47.0 RELEASE

Here is the "final" version of Ninja Scroller on Itchio and GameJolt.
I put quotation marks because everything is never totally final.
In the future, I will do at least one build with each new release of Unity.
From now on Ninja Scroller GOLD 1.xx.x will designate the versions available on GameJolt, Itchio and until further notice the DEMO Steam.
The Steam version goes its own way.
Thus, Ninja Scroller STEAM 1.51.0 means the latest version under development.
Ninja Scroller STEAM 1.51.0 will be released on March 31, 2023 at 18h00 UTC+2!

I will record new videos of 30s of Gameplay as soon as possible.

Watch 30s of Gameplay Trailer

For more information on the game visit the links below.

==============================

Ninja Scroller is a challenging pixel art action runner game with a retrogaming vibe.
You will face ninjas, wolves and tornadoes.

Features:
- If you lose it's always your fault
- Use intelligence, reflexes and stamina
- 7 levels of intense and epic difficulty
- More than 55 achievements
- At least 4 hours to complete the game at 100%

Current releases:
- STEAM 1.52.0 available for Windows 64-bit on Steam
- GOLD 1.48.0 available for Windows 64-bit on Gamejolt and Itchio
- DEMO 1.48.0 available for Windows 64-bit on Steam, Gamejolt and Itchio
